t: “Dominion*pn and awe belong to God; he*ld establishes order in the heights of heaven.
Can*ln his forces be numbered? On*ld whom does his light not rise?
How*ln then can a mortal be righteous before God? How*ld can one born of woman be pure?
If*ln even the moon is not bright and*ld the stars are not pure in his eyes,
how*ln much less a mortal, who is but a maggot— a*ld human being, who is only a worm!”
